channel.title: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB
channel.description:
The average moparscaper is pretty dumb, so when they see this in the news:
[img]http://img458.imageshack.us/img458/9804/newsig3.png[/img]
They don't realize it's a link and think that they should post here. Maybe change it to "Click here for Moparscape"?

item.title: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:67, topic:144911”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=198515.msg1773779#msg1773779 date=1190505076]

Yes yes, I’m hiding the moparscaper side of me which soon will take over this side too.

http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=76434;sa=statPanel

No joke…
[/quote]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=28549;sa=statPanel
Yh, no joke.[/quote]

No shit, I am only a moderator over there, yet I have ALL the reason in the world to “block” out my moparscapien side. :rolleyes:

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB

item.title: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:69, topic:144911”]Obviously people have the same problem the MoparScapers have with reading, I made a post on the first page of this topic, with a link to my very suggestion to fix the MoparScape issue. It is a total help page, and a more complicated TOS page.

Here is the link if people don’t feel like looking in my sig.

Way to reduce MoparScape questions[/quote]

I’m going to steal someone’s idea here. (Someone posted this before and I don’t remember who )

After the TOS page there could be a second page that had a big button at the top that said "MoparScape", then at the very bottom there could be a link that said "MITB: Boring shit you won't like".
^Someone please tell me who posted that. It was a great idea.

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB

item.title: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:63, topic:144911”][quote author=robocz033 link=topic=198515.msg1773706#msg1773706 date=1190503560]
the whole password idea was just something i thought of on the spot. now that i think of it and stuff, it would get really confusing.
[/quote]Wow, you’re really sucking up to others. Keep your opinions and just go back to moparscape, you’ve spammed mitb up with shit in these past days.[/quote]

im not sucking up. i even got confused from the password idea. im not going back to moparscape because its annoying with all the help threads. i havent spammed MITB at all except for one post…

there has been a spike in moparscapian posts today…crazy. there were like 4, somethings wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

now that i think about it, i have seen 1 maybe 2 moparscape related topics since i switched to MITB, and thats not that bad…so this topic actually is pointless because there is pretty much no problem.

[quote=“ThugLife, post:61, topic:144911”][quote author=robocz033 link=topic=198515.msg1773684#msg1773684 date=1190503213]
no, i mean come up with a completely differnet password. not one that everyone would know.
[/quote]
Defeats the whole purpose of the community, this is supposed to be a ‘open’ and ‘free’ community, the whole password protected idea is stupid in my opinion.[/quote]

the whole password idea was just something i thought of on the spot. now that i think of it and stuff, it would get really confusing.

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB

item.title: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

There is hardly any problem with moparscapers posting here, seriously i don’t even see 1 post a day regularly, even still 1 post a day is hardly a problem.

Even still all this ‘delete moparscape’ shit needs to stop, yes even though i do not like it, and all the children and pointless screaming and crap that goes on there is the reason i did not stay ‘messing’ with private servers for more than a month, yes i still hung around there and still do post there every once to see if they have progressed much, and everyone needs a good laugh once and a while

So cut the ‘delete moparscape’ shit because it is causing you next to no problem if you just ignore it, its not like you get 50 posts a day asking about private servers on this site, you get an odd one or two, not even that.

robocz033:

no, i mean come up with a completely differnet password. not one that everyone would know.

Defeats the whole purpose of the community, this is supposed to be a ‘open’ and ‘free’ community, the whole password protected idea is stupid in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“robocz033, post:52, topic:144911”]that would be pretty ridiculous. and the only way to really fix this is a answer that doesnt involve deleting or banning. something along the lines of a having everyone go through a domain and click what they want to do, go to MSCP or MITB and explain what each is for. that might work. and make it so they cant go directly to one of the domains, and if they do, they automatically get re-directly to the chosing page. that might work. and if they do end up posting about MSCP and MITB, warn/moderate them and that might learn them.[/quote]Go back to moparscape. If you warn them, they don’t care. Mute them and they make new accounts.

[quote=“Taharok, post:48, topic:144911”]How would you manage to move over 20000 active MoparScapers over to sythe which they undoubtedly already use?[/quote]When they type in the url moparisthebest.com/smf, make it pop up something saying that moparscape is now on sythe.org, you are being redirected there and then redirect them there.

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB

item.title: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

that would be pretty ridiculous. and the only way to really fix this is a answer that doesnt involve deleting or banning. something along the lines of a having everyone go through a domain and click what they want to do, go to MSCP or MITB and explain what each is for. that might work. and make it so they cant go directly to one of the domains, and if they do, they automatically get re-directly to the chosing page. that might work. and if they do end up posting about MSCP and MITB, warn/moderate them and that might learn them.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

People keep saying “delete moparscape” when, if you stop and think about if for five minutes, you would realize that is the worst possible move imaginable. Let’s review moparscape for a second:

  1. If we remove MoparScape, they will all come here
  2. Creating a quiz on the rules will make them read the rules, yes, but who the hell says they will follow them?
  3. They will learn, just do not want to learn the proper way because that takes too much “work”
  4. Stickies are no use because of #2

Anyone got anymore ideas of how to fix the MoparScape dilemma?

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestion to help keep MSCP off of MITB
